Package hu.klenium.tetris.view.window

Class MainApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • hu.klenium.tetris.view.window.MainApplication
  • public class MainApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
    Manages the JavaFX Application. The application is created by calling init(Runnable). At first, the window is empty, a new game must call createFrame() to add elements.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

      Fields

      A task called when the application is ready to use.

      The application's scene, it stores all GUI elements.

      • createFrame

        public static GameFrame createFrame()
        Creates a new frame that a new game can use to display it's state.
        Returns:

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Automatically called when the application is ready. Cunfigures the window's common properties. When done, calls readyTask.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
